attributes.action: more help for single teenagers in living on there own
attributes.additional_details: Teenagers 19 and over single living with no children do not get the help that we should be getting because were not priority because we dont have children, this is not fair, some teenagers dont want children just yet, it feels like because we dont have children, we get treated unfairly and were not priority, there should be more rights for single teenagers living independently, it seems these days we dont get more help, just because were living on our own without children.
